document_data.name: Stalker
document_data.mainbody: '''''Stalker''''' was a special [[divine magic|divine]] [[conjuration]] [[quest spell]] from the [[creation sphere|creation]], [[guardian sphere|guardian]], and [[plant sphere]]s that essentially summoned a group of [[shambling mound]]s to serve the caster.
document_data.Effects: When this spell was cast 3â€“7 plant creatures resembling shambling mounds were conjured to aid the caster. The conjured plant creatures would remain with the [[priest]] for a full week unless dismissed early. If summoned specifically for guard duty, the ''stalkers'' would stand guard for up to seven months provided their duties only included guarding a specific location.
document_data.Components: This spell did not require [[spell component]]s of any kind.
document_data.History: This spell was used by [[druid]]s who served [[Moander]] during the height of ancient [[Netheril]]'s power.
